name: Akiflow
headline: All your tasks and calendars into one blazingly fast app
description:
Akiflow is a Tasks + Calendars productivity app
‚ö°Ô∏è Capture tasks from multiple sources
‚öôÔ∏è Process fast with shortcuts (plan/snooze)
‚úÖ Increase your focus and personal organization

founders.name: Nunzio Martinello, Founder & CEO
founders.description:
I've been an entrepreneur since 2012, ran a Performance Marketing & Software Dev. Company (#259, FT top 1000 for growth in Europe, 2020 - #29 in Italy for Statista) and co-founded different companies/startups into Affiliate Marketing / eSports / Food. Forbes under 30 Italy 2019.
I'm Italian, living in Bangalore (India).

founders.name: Sebastiano Favaro, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and CTO of Akiflow. 

Previously CTO in a Software Dev. Company & Performance Marketing (#259, FT top 1000 for growth in Europe, 2020).

![GitHub](https://akiflow.com/images/app/logos/github-grey.svg) ![Hotjar](https://akiflow.com/images/app/logos/hotjar-grey.svg) A life-changing Productivity Co-pilot Built on automatic sync, AI-powered self organization, and flawless design, Akiflow eliminates guesswork, enabling you to conquer every day. ![Akiflow Sync Engine](https://akiflow.com/images/app/slides/akiflow-sync-engine.png) ![Engineered for Time Blocking](https://akiflow.com/images/app/slides/engineered-for-time-blocking.png) ![Meeting Booking Assistant](https://akiflow.com/images/app/slides/meeting-booking-assistant.png) ![Akiflow Sync Engine](https://akiflow.com/images/app/slides/akiflow-sync-engine.png) Akiflow Sync Engine Bring all your tasks and events in one place with flawless native integrations. ![Engineered for Time Blocking](https://akiflow.com/images/app/slides/engineered-for-time-blocking.png) Engineered for Time Blocking Our calendar supports Events, Tasks and Time Slots. Just drag & drop anything in calendar to build your plan. ![Meeting Booking Assistant](https://akiflow.com/images/app/slides/meeting-booking-assistant.png) Meeting Booking Assistant Share your available slots in seconds with our smart scheduling links. No more back-and-forth and maximum protection of your time. Purpose-built Suite for Modern Productivity Every feature is designed following productivity principles to maximise productivity and minimize the effort needed to organise yourself. ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/universal-inbox.png) The Universal Inbox No more switching between apps. Automatically import your tasks from 3000+ tools into one Inbox. [ Learn more  ](https://akiflow.com/) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/smart-notification.png) Smart Notification - Never miss a meeting again Real-Time meeting notifications with timely alerts across devices. [ Learn more ](https://akiflow.com/) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/daily-rituals-assistant.png) Daily Rituals Assistant Review and plan your days with our rituals assistant for enhanced focus and productivity. [ Learn more  ](https://akiflow.com/) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/your-team-calendar.png) Your Team Calendars Check your co-worker's schedule with just one click and experience seamless clarity and real-time coordination. [ Learn more  ](https://akiflow.com/) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/ai-co-pilot.png) AI Co-pilot that learns your habits Unlock the power of a cutting-edge AI model that auto-assigns tasks, tailored to you. [ Learn more  ](https://akiflow.com/) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/chats-and-emails-into-tasks.png) Chats and Emails into tasks Never miss a great idea or to-do again - instantly turn any email or message into a task. [ Learn more  ](https://akiflow.com/) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/offline.png) Works offline Work offline without worrying about your internet connection. ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/features/shortcuts-and-commandbar.png) Shortcuts and Command Bar Perform routine tasks in seconds, boosting efficiency and saving time. [ Learn more  ](https://akiflow.com/) and 50+ more features [ See all  ](https://akiflow.com/) We Build Things Fast With constant updates, we‚Äôre here to make sure you‚Äôre always in control of your productivity ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/stats.png) Level Up Your Stats Analysis with Tags & Projects ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/cli.png) üí™ Run fast! Create tasks directly in your Time Slots ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/widget.png) üì± Mobile Widget: Updates on the go ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/organization.png) ‚ú® AI-powered self-organization, is here! ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/rituals.png) üåà Design a structured life with Daily and Weekly rituals ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/dark-mode.png) üî¶ Choose your way: the Dark Mode it‚Äôs here ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/time-slots.png) üëã Say Hello to Time Slots ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/updates/world-map.png) ü§© Together is better: create your team in Akiflow Designed for High-Performing Professionals ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/founders-and-c-levels.png) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/developers.png) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/sales.png) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/marketers.png) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/designers.png) ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/founders-and-c-levels.png) Founders & C-Level Executives Stay on top of your impossible agendas and achieve your goals, freeing up time for high-impact decisions. ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/developers.png) Developers Akiflow streamlines task and time management for developers, ensuring you can focus on what you do best ‚Äî coding. ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/sales.png) Sales Akiflow helps sales professionals manage tasks and time efficiently, allowing you to focus on closing deals. ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/marketers.png) Marketers Akiflow is designed to help marketers manage tasks and time efficiently, allowing you to focus on driving impactful campaigns. ![](https://akiflow.com/images/app/personas/designers.png) Designers Akiflow helps designers manage tasks and time efficiently, allowing you to focus on creativity. Connect Akiflow with all your essential apps to create a unified and efficient workflow. [ See all Integrations  ](https://akiflow.com/) What customers are saying      Akiflow is Get Things Done on steroids. I can easily manage my to-do items, schedule them or leave them in the Someday bucket if they are not tied to a deadline. I love that I can see my calendar and my to-do items on one screen so I can also evaluate how many calls I can add to my day based on the items in my backlog. It also integrates with Slack perfectly, so I can save items and send them to my inbox instead of relying on Slack reminders. Well done. ![Jonathan Leung](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/jonathan_leung_avatar.png) Jonathan Leung I have used Asana, Click Up, Monday and Notion, and of all the tools, Akiflow is the best for me right now. And that's because of two main things. One is the integration between calendar and tasks being super seamless and other is because of the freaking keyboard shortcuts. There's a keyboard shortcut for everything, and I love that. So that makes it very easy to use. Thank you so much, Akiflow team, for making this incredible piece of software. ![Celina Mukarker](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/celina_mukarker_avatar.jpg) Celina Mukarker Akiflow is the only app that broke my long #habit of handwriting #tasks and #deadlines! Now I have all of my tasks and calendar management in Akiflow. ![Francesca Marano](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/francesca_marano_avatar.jpg) Francesca Marano Akiflow is Get Things Done on steroids. I can easily manage my to-do items, schedule them or leave them in the Someday bucket if they are not tied to a deadline. I love that I can see my calendar and my to-do items on one screen so I can also evaluate how many calls I can add to my day based on the items in my backlog. It also integrates with Slack perfectly, so I can save items and send them to my inbox instead of relying on Slack reminders. Well done. ![Jonathan Leung](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/jonathan_leung_avatar.png) Jonathan Leung Full Stack Engineer ![Calm](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/calm_logo.png) ![Celina Mukarker](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/celina_mukarker_avatar.jpg) Celina Mukarker VC ![Benson Oak](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/benson_oak_logo.png) ![Francesca Marano](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/francesca_marano_avatar.jpg) Francesca Marano Associate Director ![XWP](https://akiflow.com/images/app/reviews/xwp_logo.png) ![Callout](https://akiflow.com/images/app/callout/bg-1.svg) Our users save up to 2 hours / day Try Akiflow today and experience a smarter way to manage your tasks and meetings. generated_description:
**Akiflow** is a productivity app based out of Padua, Italy, founded in 2019 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S20. The company's mission is to unify all your tasks and calendars into one fast, efficient application.

At its core, Akiflow combines task management with calendaring to help users capture tasks from multiple sources and manage their time effectively using powerful shortcuts. Its key features include a **Universal Inbox** that imports tasks from over 3000 apps, time blocking capabilities, and real-time notifications for meetings. With a small and dedicated team of 11 employees, Akiflow is designed to enhance focus and personal organization, making it a favorite among high-performing professionals.

The team is led by Brad Flora, a Group Partner at Y Combinator, and aims to empower over 100,000 managers and professionals by streamlining their workflows. Akiflow's offering may seem ambitious, but the feedback from users suggests it's hitting the mark. Users report saving up to 2 hours a day, thanks to its intuitive features and seamless integrations with tools like Slack, Google Calendar, and Notion.

As the world becomes increasingly complex, applications like Akiflow stand out because they don‚Äôt just replace other tools; they simplify processes by eliminating the need to switch back and forth between apps. Instead, they create a cohesive ecosystem where tasks and schedules coexist harmoniously.

For more information or to try Akiflow for free, visit their official website at [akiflow.com](https://akiflow.com).
